name: The Universe Factory
description:
//This is an early prototype to test the upload system, game will be regularly updated until next Sunday//




YOU   ARE   GOD

  • Join atoms together to form molecules
  • This is a Drag&Drop-game, use LMB to pick an atom on the treadmill
  • Each molecule has a unique animation
  • Try to make the highest score
  • Game has been fully hand-drawn

This game was made in Fusion 2.5 for the GameMaker Toolkit GameJam 2021 with the "Join Together" theme. Thanks to : @benjaminberrebi_ (animation/graphism) @lnrd.x (Dev) VincentD (dev) and @br-ger (GameDesign/prod). This is our first timed competition and videogames. Please leave a comment for any inquiry, idea or feedback.

Music :

Titre:  The Return

Auteur: Alexander Nakarada

Source: https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Téléchargement (4MB): https://auboutdufil.com/?id=527

From FrenchNoobs, with love.
